source.query:
select 
  id, 
  name_en, 
  name_ar, 
  taxon_id, 
  kitchen_recipe_id as recipe_id, 
  quantity, 
  COALESCE(Cast(measurement AS CHARACTER varying),'') AS measurement,
  created_at, 
  updated_at 
from 
  spree_kitchen_ingredients
order by id ASC;

select 
  -- id,
  Cast(kitchen_ingredient_id AS integer) AS ingredient_id,
  Cast(recommended_product_id AS integer) AS product_id
from spree_ingredient_products
-- order by id asc;

SELECT id,
       product_id,
       Cast(action_price as double precision),
       action_in_stock AS track_stock,
       COALESCE(rule_supermarket_id, -1) AS supermarket_id,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	   Cast(action_sale_price as double precision) AS sale_price,
       Date(action_sale_start) AS sale_start_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_start, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS sale_start_time,
       Date(action_sale_end) AS sale_end_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_end, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)   AS sale_end_time,
       Date(availability_start_time) AS availability_start_date,
       -- availability_start_time (timestamp without time zone so we need to extract using string manipulation) 
       Date(availability_end_time) AS availability_end_date,
       stock_quantity,
       action_sale_price AS cost_price
FROM   spree_product_inventory_modifiers
order by id ASC;

Select
  id,
  user_id,
  tenant_id,
  loyalty_member_id,
  loyalty_id,
  created_at,
  updated_at
from spree_loyalty_members;

WITH json_to_extract AS
(
       SELECT id,
              quantity_en AS quantity,
              product_id,
              created_at,
              updated_at,
              quantity_ar,
              nutrients :: jsonb AS json_data
       FROM   spree_nutritional_facts )
SELECT    id,
          quantity,
          quantity_ar,
          product_id,
          calories,
          total_fat,
          saturated_fat,
          trans_fat,
          cholesterol,
          total_carbohydrates,
          sugar,
          dietary_fiber,
          protein,
          salt,
          sodium,
          iron,
          calcium,
          vitamin_a,
          vitamin_c,
          vitamin_d,
          ph,
          created_at,
          updated_at
FROM      json_to_extract
LEFT JOIN lateral
          (
                 Select ( Regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calories:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]            AS calories,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS total_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'saturated_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]       AS saturated_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'trans_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS trans_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'cholesterol:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]         AS cholesterol,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_carbohydrates:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1] AS total_carbohydrates,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sugar:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS sugar,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'fiber:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS dietary_fiber,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'protein:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS protein,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'salt:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS salt,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sodium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]              AS sodium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'iron:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS iron,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calcium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS calcium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_a:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_a,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_c:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_c,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_d:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_d,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'ph:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                  AS ph ) AS nutrient_values
ON        true
ORDER BY  id ASC;

SELECT id,
	COALESCE(sku, '') AS sku,
       COALESCE(Cast(price AS DOUBLE PRECISION),0) as price,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	COALESCE(name_en, '') AS name,
       1 AS country_id,
       1 AS order
FROM   spree_custom_products;

SELECT 
    id AS offline_product_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN (barcode_element ~ E'^\\d+$') THEN CAST(barcode_element AS BIGINT)
        ELSE -1
    END AS barcode,
    1 AS "order"
FROM   
    spree_custom_products
CROSS JOIN LATERAL unnest(barcodes) AS barcode_element
ORDER BY 
    id DESC;

select sot.id, 
	sott1.name as name_en,
	coalesce(sott2.name,'') as name_ar,
	coalesce(sott1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
	coalesce(sott2.presentation,'') as presentation_ar,
    sot.created_at,
    sot.updated_at
	
from spree_option_types sot
left join spree_option_type_translations sott1 on sot.id = sott1.spree_option_type_id
and sott1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_type_translations sott2 on sot.id = sott2.spree_option_type_id
and sott2.locale='ar';

SELECT sov.id,
       coalesce(sovt1.name,'') as name,
       position,
	   coalesce(sovt1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
       coalesce(sovt2.presentation,'') AS presentation_ar,
       sov.option_type_id,
       sov.created_at,
       sov.updated_at
FROM   spree_option_values sov
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt1
on sov.id = sovt1.spree_option_value_id and sovt1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt2
on sov.id = sovt2.spree_option_value_id and sovt2.locale='ar';

WITH delivery_instructions AS (
    SELECT 
        sli.line_item_id,
        CONCAT('Preferred Cut - ', COALESCE(spc.name, ''), '::', STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ', COALESCE(scp.name_en, ''), ' ', round(sli.quantity/1000.0,2), ' ', 'kg'), ', '), STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ',COALESCE(scp.name_ar, ''), ' ', round(sli.quantity/1000.0,2), ' ', 'kg'), ', ')
        ) AS delivery_instruction
    FROM spree_line_item_cut_patterns sli
    LEFT JOIN spree_cut_patterns scp ON scp.id = sli.cut_pattern_id 
    LEFT JOIN spree_preferred_cuts spc ON spc.id = scp.preferred_cut_id
    GROUP BY sli.line_item_id,spc.name
    ORDER BY sli.line_item_id
)

SELECT 
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
    COALESCE(siu.quantity_count, 0) as quantity,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale=false THEN a.price
        ELSE '0.0'
    END as action_price,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale=true THEN a.price
        ELSE '0'
    END as sale_price,
    b.product_id,
    di.delivery_instruction,
    CASE
        WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
        WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS replacement_pref,
    e.quantity AS picked_quantity,
    null as picker_id,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0) as order_shipment_id,
    1 AS category_id, -- default value = 1 (grocery id from category table)
    '' as status
FROM spree_line_items a 
LEFT JOIN spree_variants b ON b.id = a.variant_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ON (line_item_id) * FROM spree_inventory_units) c ON c.line_item_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT line_item_id, state , COUNT(id) as quantity_count
  FROM spree_inventory_units GROUP BY line_item_id, state) siu ON siu.line_item_id = a.id AND siu.state != 'canceled'
LEFT JOIN spree_orders d ON d.id = c.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_picked_items e ON e.pickable_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN delivery_instructions di ON di.line_item_id = a.id
ORDER BY a.id DESC;

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.bill_address_id as address_id,
	'true' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.bill_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id 
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

UNION ALL

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.ship_address_id as address_id,
	'false' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.ship_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

select sa.id,
	sa.order_id,
    sa.created_at,
    sa.updated_at,
    sa.source_id,
    sa.adjustable_id,
    sa.adjustment_reason_id as adjustable_reason_id,
    sa.amount,
    sa.promotion_code_id,
    sa.eligible,
    sa.included,
    sa.finalized,
    sa.free_sample,
    substring(sa.source_type,8) as source_type,
    sa.label,
    substring(sa.adjustable_type,8) as adjustable_type
from spree_adjustments sa
left join spree_orders so on sa.order_id = so.id and so.state !='cart'

WITH RankedResults AS (
    SELECT
        cancel_reason,
        created_at,
        updated_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cancel_reason ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rn
    FROM spree_fulfilments
    WHERE cancel_reason IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
    cancel_reason AS reason_en,
    '' AS reason_ar,
    true AS visible,
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM RankedResults
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as id,
  so.id as order_id,
  ss.id as shipment_id,
  so.created_at,
  so.currency,
  coalesce(so.payment_amount_received,0) as amount,
  so.auto_approved as approved,
  sp_max.v1_payment_id as transaction_id
FROM spree_orders so 
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT sp.response_code as v1_payment_id
    FROM spree_payments sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_payment_methods spm ON spm.id = sp.payment_method_id
    WHERE sp.order_id = so.id
	 AND (
		 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_payments WHERE order_id = so.id) <= 1 OR
		spm.type NOT IN ('Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint', 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit')
	 )
    ORDER BY sp.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
) sp_max ON true
LEFT JOIN spree_shipments ss on ss.order_id = so.id
where so.state != 'cart';

select 
sr.id,
sp.order_id,
case 
when sr.transaction_id is not null then sr.transaction_id 
else sp.response_code 
end as transaction_id,
sr.created_at,
sr.updated_at,
sr.amount,
case 
	when sr.status='uncertain' then 'pending'
	when sr.status='failed' then 'failed'
	when sr.status='success' then 'approved'
	else ''
End as status,
'SAR' as currency,
'' as type
From spree_refunds sr
inner join spree_payments sp on sp.id=sr.payment_id 
where sr.payment_id is not null;

SELECT
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
    COALESCE(SUM(siu.quantity_count), 0) AS quantity,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale = false THEN a.price
        ELSE '0.0'
    END AS action_price,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale = true THEN a.price
        ELSE '0'
    END AS sale_price,
    b.product_id,
    CASE
      WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
      WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
      ELSE NULL
    END AS replacement_pref,
    COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0) AS picked_quantity,
    0 AS picker_id,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0) AS order_shipment_id,
    1 AS category_id, -- default value = 1 (grocery id from category table)
    '' AS status
FROM spree_line_items a 
LEFT JOIN spree_variants b ON b.id = a.variant_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (line_item_id) * 
    FROM spree_inventory_units
) c ON c.line_item_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        line_item_id, 
        state, 
        COUNT(id) AS quantity_count
    FROM spree_inventory_units 
    GROUP BY line_item_id, state
) siu ON siu.line_item_id = a.id AND siu.state != 'canceled'
LEFT JOIN spree_orders d ON d.id = c.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_picked_items e ON e.pickable_id = a.id
GROUP BY
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    a.on_sale,
    b.product_id,
    d.replace_product,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0)
ORDER BY a.id;

SELECT id,
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       deleted_at,
       CASE
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit' THEN 'e-wlt'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::Tamara' THEN 'tamara'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::BogusSimple' THEN 'bogus-simple'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::Check' THEN 'cod'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint' THEN 'loy-pts'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
        Else '' 
		End as code
FROM   spree_payment_methods
where name is not null
ORDER  BY id ASC;

WITH brand AS (
  SELECT 
    rt.id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_en,'') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(
      CASE
        WHEN LENGTH(rt.name_en) < 5 THEN 
          UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) || '_' || rt.id
        ELSE 
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', 'g'), 1, 1)) ||
          UPPER(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTRING(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(rt.name_en, ' ', ''), '[^a-zA-Z0-9]', ' ', 'g'), 2), ' ', ''), 1, 1)) ||
          '_' || rt.id
      END, 
    '') AS code,
    rt.created_at,
    rt.updated_at,
    rt.temp_taxon_id,
    COALESCE(rt.name_ar, '') AS name_ar
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
      st.id AS temp_taxon_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) AS name_en,
      MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) AS name_ar,
      st.created_at,
      st.updated_at
    FROM spree_taxons st
    LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
    WHERE st.parent_id IN (
      SELECT st.id 
      FROM spree_taxons st 
      JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt ON stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id AND stt.locale = 'en'
      WHERE stt.name = 'Brands'
    )
    GROUP BY st.id
  ) AS rt
  ORDER BY rt.temp_taxon_id ASC
), 
supplier AS (
  SELECT 
    REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
    LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
    MAX(spt.created_at) AS created_at,
    MAX(spt.updated_at) AS updated_at,
    MAX(spt.deleted_at) AS deleted_at
  FROM (
    SELECT
      spree_product_id,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) AS supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) AS code,
      MAX(created_at) AS created_at,
      MAX(updated_at) AS updated_at,
      MAX(deleted_at) AS deleted_at
    FROM spree_product_translations
    WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY spree_product_id
  ) AS spt
  GROUP BY spt.code
), 
cte AS (
  SELECT 
    sp.id,
    sp.tax_category_id,
    sp.refundable,
    sp.moq_limit,
    sp.meta_title,
    sp.loyalty_point,
    sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
    sp_table.validity_tag,
    sp_table.slug,
    sp_table.size,
	REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(sp_table.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS supplier_code,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name_ar, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.name, '') AS name,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords_ar, '') AS meta_keywords_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_keywords, '') AS meta_keywords,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description_ar, '') AS meta_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.meta_description, '') AS meta_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description_ar, '') AS short_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description_ar, '') AS long_description_ar,
    COALESCE(sp_table.short_description, '') AS short_description,
    COALESCE(sp_table.long_description, '') AS long_description,
    COALESCE(sp.is_loyalty_reward, 'false') AS issue_loyalty_points,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.electronic_product_code = '' THEN NULL 
      ELSE CAST(sp.electronic_product_code AS INT)
    END AS electronic_product_code,
    CASE
      WHEN sp.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
      ELSE FALSE
    END AS is_deleted,
    COALESCE(sp.crushable, false) AS crushable,
    sp.created_at,
    sp.updated_at,
    sp.cod_enabled,
    COALESCE(CAST(sp.available_on AS DATE), CAST(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS DATE)) AS available_on,
    sp.bundled,
    sp.bin_category_id,
    brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id AS default_taxon_id,
    sv.width,
    sv.weight_increment,
    sv.weight,
    sv.sku,
    case when
    CAST(sv.perform_liquid_weight_check AS INT) = 0 Then 'False'
    ELSE 'True'
    END AS perform_liquid_weight_check,
    sv.max_weight_per_order,
    sv.height,
    sv.depth,
    sv.default_weight_count,
    FALSE AS promotable,
    TRUE AS is_wishlisted,
    FALSE AS is_gluten_free,
    '' AS discount,
    FALSE AS deactivate,
    ds_country.country_id,
    1 AS category_id,
    brand_taxon.brand_id AS brand_id
  FROM spree_products sp
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      sp.id,
	  MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.validity_tag END) AS validity_tag,
      MAX(sptrans.slug) AS slug,
      MAX(sptrans.pack_size) AS size,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.name END) AS name,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_keywords END) AS meta_keywords,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.meta_description END) AS meta_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description_ar,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS short_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'en' THEN sptrans.description END) AS long_description,
      MAX(CASE WHEN sptrans.locale = 'ar' THEN sptrans.manufacturer END) AS supplier_code
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_translations sptrans ON sptrans.spree_product_id = sp.id
    GROUP BY sp.id
  ) AS sp_table ON sp_table.id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      sp.id, 
      db.country_id 
    FROM spree_products sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_product_inventory_modifiers sim ON sp.id = sim.product_id
    LEFT JOIN danube_supermarkets db ON sim.rule_supermarket_id = db.id
    GROUP BY sp.id, db.country_id
  ) AS ds_country ON sp.id = ds_country.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY prod_taxon.product_id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC) AS row_num,
      b.temp_taxon_id,
      b.id AS brand_id, 
      prod_taxon.product_id AS product_id
    FROM brand b 
    LEFT JOIN spree_products_taxons prod_taxon ON b.temp_taxon_id = prod_taxon.taxon_id
  ) AS brand_taxon ON brand_taxon.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY product_id ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS row_num, 
      *
    FROM spree_variants 
  ) sv ON sv.product_id = sp.id
  LEFT JOIN supplier sup ON sup.code = sp_table.supplier_code AND sup.code != ''
  WHERE (brand_taxon.row_num = 1 OR brand_taxon.row_num IS NULL) 
    AND (sv.row_num = 1 OR sv.row_num IS NULL)
GROUP BY 
        sp.id, 
        sp.tax_category_id,
        sp.refundable,
        sp.moq_limit,
        sp.meta_title,
        sp.loyalty_point,
        sp_table.validity_tag_ar,
        sp_table.validity_tag,
        sp_table.slug,
		brand_taxon.temp_taxon_id,
        sp_table.size,
        sp_table.supplier_name,
        sp_table.name_ar,
        sp_table.name,
        sp_table.meta_keywords_ar,
        sp_table.meta_keywords,
        sp_table.meta_description_ar,
        sp_table.meta_description,
        sp_table.short_description_ar,
        sp_table.long_description_ar,
        sp_table.short_description,
        sp_table.long_description,
        sp.is_loyalty_reward,
		    brand_taxon.brand_id,
        sp.electronic_product_code,
        sp.deleted_at,
        sp.crushable,
        sp.created_at,
        sp.updated_at,
        sp.cod_enabled,
        sp.available_on,
        sp.bundled,
        sp.bin_category_id,
        sv.width,
        sv.weight_increment,
        sv.weight,
        sv.sku,
        sv.perform_liquid_weight_check,
        sv.max_weight_per_order,
        sv.height,
        sv.depth,
        sv.default_weight_count,
        ds_country.country_id
)
SELECT 
  filtered_cte.id,
    filtered_cte.tax_category_id,
    filtered_cte.refundable,
    filtered_cte.moq_limit,
    filtered_cte.meta_title,
    filtered_cte.loyalty_point,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag_ar,
    filtered_cte.validity_tag,
    filtered_cte.slug,
    filtered_cte.size,
	filtered_cte.supplier_code as temp_supplier_code,
    filtered_cte.name_ar,
    filtered_cte.name,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_keywords,
    filtered_cte.meta_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.meta_description,
    filtered_cte.short_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.long_description_ar,
    filtered_cte.short_description,
    filtered_cte.long_description,
    filtered_cte.issue_loyalty_points,
    filtered_cte.electronic_product_code,
    filtered_cte.is_deleted,
    filtered_cte.crushable,
    filtered_cte.created_at,
    filtered_cte.updated_at,
    filtered_cte.cod_enabled,
    filtered_cte.available_on,
    filtered_cte.bundled,
    filtered_cte.bin_category_id,
    filtered_cte.default_taxon_id,
    filtered_cte.width,
    filtered_cte.weight_increment,
    filtered_cte.weight,
    filtered_cte.sku,
    filtered_cte.perform_liquid_weight_check,
    filtered_cte.max_weight_per_order,
    filtered_cte.height,
    filtered_cte.depth,
    filtered_cte.default_weight_count,
    filtered_cte.promotable,
    filtered_cte.is_wishlisted,
    filtered_cte.is_gluten_free,
    filtered_cte.discount,
    filtered_cte.deactivate,
    filtered_cte.country_id,
    filtered_cte.category_id,
    filtered_cte.brand_id
FROM (
  SELECT 
    cte.*,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY id ORDER BY country_id) AS rn 
  FROM cte
) filtered_cte
WHERE rn = 1;

sink.preCopyScript: ALTER TABLE product ADD COLUMN temp_taxon_id INT;

source.query:
With cte AS
  (select id, name as supplier_code 
  from supplier
)
UPDATE product p
SET supplier_id = cte.id
FROM cte
WHERE p.temp_supplier_code = cte.supplier_code;
WITH cte1 AS (
    SELECT id, temp_taxon_id
    FROM brand
)
UPDATE product p
SET brand_id = cte1.id
FROM cte1
WHERE p.temp_taxon_id = cte1.temp_taxon_id;
SELECT 'Update Supplier ID and Brand ID' as ID;

Alter table product add column temp_supplier_code varchar(200);
SELECT 'Adding Supplier_Code' As Update

SELECT ppv.id,
       ppv.created_at,
       ppv.item_id AS inventory_modifier_id,
       ppv.whodunnit AS user_id,
	   pim.product_id,
	   pim.rule_supermarket_id as supermarket_id,
       ppv.object_changes,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>0)::numeric AS action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>0)::numeric AS sale_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_sale_price,
       ppv.event
FROM spree_product_price_versions ppv
left join spree_product_inventory_modifiers pim
on pim.id = ppv.item_id
order by ppv.id;
